definition: stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns

sentences.english: Extracts from the bacterium B. brevis contain a peptide with antibiotic properties.
sentences.chinese: 枯草桿菌提取物中含一種具有抗生素性質的肽。

sentences.english: A mutant of B. subtilis 168 mutagenized with NG.
sentences.chinese: 用NG誘變枯草桿菌168所得的一個突變型。

sentences.english: The shell of spore of Bacillus subtilis var. niger was blurred and swollen.
sentences.chinese: 枯草桿菌黑色變種芽孢外殼模糊腫脹。
